Title: Providence (2)
Plot: Scully is anxious to recover William from his kidnappers and takes matters into her own hands when the FBI's attempts to assist in the investigation are less than helpful. With the help of the Lone Gunmen, Scully discovers terrifying information about her child's captors, and is once again forced to confront the mystery regarding the sinister interest in her son.
GuestStars: Cary Elwes, Neal McDonough, Jamie McShane, Brian Morri, Christian Hastings, Brad Kalas, Kevin McCorkle, McNally Sagal, Denis Forest, Alan Dale, Kerrie Keane
